sentences.en: Against Zerg, they are better suited against those pesky armored Roaches with the fast green.
sentences.cn: 对虫族, 他们更适合对付那些讨厌的装甲蟑螂的快速再生.

sentences.en: And what about those pesky imbalances?
sentences.cn: 而且烦人的全球失衡问题怎么办 呢 ?

sentences.en: But experts know that fatigue, stress, and caffeine all increase the likelihood of the pesky twitching.
sentences.cn: 专家知道,过度疲劳 、 压力和咖啡因都可增加眼皮跳的可能性.

sentences.en: Getting a steal , disrupting the other team'sand rhythm, those little pesky things ( really help ).
sentences.cn: 哪怕是他一次 抢断, 就足以扰乱对方的进攻节奏, 这些都是球队需要的.

sentences.en: Oh, how I hate how those pesky hangers scrape up my wooden closet rod.
sentences.cn: 哦, 如何如何,我恨那些讨厌的架子刮了我的木制衣柜杆.

sentences.en: Saturn won't be as pesky as he was in your eighth house and that's a relief.
sentences.cn: 土星将不会被讨厌的,因为他是在你的第八宫,这我就放心了.

sentences.en: They're on the prowl at a handful of police stations, keeping pesky rodents in check.
sentences.cn: 它们在少数几个警察局附近四处走动,吓阻讨厌的老鼠.

sentences.en: Those pesky people are really annoying.
sentences.cn: 那群讨厌鬼真叫人讨厌.

sentences.en: Those pesky salesmen always call at dinner time.
sentences.cn: 那些讨厌的推销员总是在吃晚饭的时候打电话.

sentences.en: You have to beat the pesky demons and keep away from them as as you can.
sentences.cn: 你要尽可能的发挥你的最大潜能去消灭这些可恶的魔鬼们.

words.tran_cn: 害虫；有害之物；讨厌的人
